response_requirements.initial_response_description: General standard: reasonable time. Executive agencies: 3 business days to acknowledge; 15 business days for standard requests; 45-180 business days for time-intensive requests
response_requirements.final_response_notes: Executive agencies have specific timelines: Standard (≤8 hours work): 15 business days. Time-intensive (>8 hours): 45 business days (may extend to 180 business days or 270 calendar days max)
response_requirements.extension_notes: Executive agencies may extend time-intensive requests to max 180 business days or 270 calendar days, whichever shorter
response_requirements.deemed_denial: Failure to respond within applicable timeframe deemed denial

fee_structure.search_fee_notes: May charge reasonable fee for providing copies; cannot exceed actual reproduction cost
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: Maximum $1/page for first 50 pages; maximum $0.50/page thereafter
fee_structure.electronic_fee: Actual cost but not more than hard copy fee
fee_structure.advance_payment_required: Executive agencies may require payment before standard request; must require payment before time-intensive request

exemptions.description: Writings protected by other legally recognized privileges or work product doctrine
Writings where disclosure would constitute unwarranted invasion of personal privacy
Medical records, patient records, medical information, Medicaid records
Writings where disclosure would violate any other law

appeal_process.first_level_notes: No administrative appeal specified in statute; court enforcement available
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Attorney fees may be available through court action

requester_requirements.request_format_notes: No specific form required; right to inspect and take copy

agency_obligations.records_officer_notes: Public officer or employee responsible for records
agency_obligations.record_keeping_required: Officers must correctly make and accurately keep detailed records affording full information on activities
agency_obligations.prohibition_on_removal: Cannot remove public writing from office/building where kept unless copying would be unduly burdensome

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields manually verified from official Alabama statute. General: reasonable time. Executive agencies have specific timelines (3 day ack; 15 days standard; 45-180 days time-intensive). Max $1/page first 50 pages, $0.50/page thereafter. Residency requirement - Alabama citizens only. Deemed denial if no response within applicable timeframe. Enhanced executive agency requirements since 2016.
